e631491d-b15f-44c8-ab04-4cd3310c5b87: A simple but robust Kellid greatsword. A drop of blood glistens on the scratched black blade. There is an engraving on the iron handle: "I am the Weapon. I wound all." A dire curse lies on the sword, but your mythical powers have weakened it and made the weapon safe for its user... more or less.
95ce1142-c919-4725-981c-0e34e289ff23: The blade of this +5 vorpal unholy longsword bears the words etched in dark bile: "My treasury is my prison". Whenever it lands a hit, the target must make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 15 + the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}), or be imprisoned in crystal for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This condition is identical to paralysis, except this condition can be applied to creatures who are usually immune to paralysis.
ebe9fdcc-a8a4-432d-bb4f-74e8d2ba3aea: The wielder of this +5 adamantine greataxe can use a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} to make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} against any enemy with a 30 feet range. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, the target must make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 30) or become {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g}.
4f4d4459-9474-4e61-b112-53cfe1c22140: This +3 adamantine battleaxe gives its wielder a +3 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If equipped together with the Guardian's shield, this bonus is increased to +6, and on a successful hit an attack of opportunity made with it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g}.
e66e52e6-a415-4ba6-9ad9-7f9d53e0481f: This +3 furyborn keen warhammer has a doubled {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical threat range{/g}. Whenever it threatens a critical hit against a Medium {g|Encyclopedia:Size}sized{/g} creature, it is automatically confirmed. Whenever it lands a hit, the target must make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 35) or become {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
879b764a-97f2-4adb-8f68-9c082c0c9878: This creature's armor is damaged by the Disfigured angel glaive. It suffers a stacking {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
fbeae8d8-3d5a-4b2f-aa50-7212ccb667a6: This creature's armor is damaged by the Mutilated Angel glaive. It takes a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, stacking up to -5.
c7511382-3de1-4e7f-b4fb-a72168ec628a: This magic axe can produce its small copies and throw them at the enemy.
c8451507-1b84-446f-943a-e677c1e11997:
This weapon is a +5 adamantine glaive. Whenever it is used to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil-aligned{/g} creature, it grants the wielder a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to the attack roll and deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d10{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} on hit.
Whenever it lands a hit, the target suffers a stacking -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} until the end of combat.
The wielder suffers a -6 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. Whenever the wielder makes an attack with this weapon, it deals them 1d6 slashing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
39bdf148-5dc5-412e-b118-2a770efe909c:
This weapon is a +5 adamantine glaive. Whenever the wielder uses it to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} creature, it grants a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to the attack roll, and deals additionally {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d12{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} on hit.
Whenever this weapon lands a hit, it inflicts a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} until the end of combat. This penalty stacks up to -5.
The wielder takes a -3 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}.
e9ea0640-b892-4550-bb20-aafefb1493f5: When this +1 heartseekerÂ nunchaku is wielded by a monk, it grants its wielder a +5 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g}.
6af0d512-d472-438b-af4c-6e558dc05102: Whenever the wielder of this +4 quarterstaff casts any summon monster {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, all summoned creatures gain a +6 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}.
d5c1ba22-c883-4550-b011-9d293a25d82f: Whenever the wielder of this +5 unholy longsword hits an enemy with it, the target must make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 35 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}, or take additionally {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} and 1d8 negative energy damage.
847914e2-157c-4600-8dff-ed439e450af6: Whenever this +1 cold iron longsword is used to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} a demon, it gains a +2 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to the attack roll and deals extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} on hit.
e57efa80-cedd-40c0-a1e5-b60250e04e44: Whenever this +1 ghost touch punching dagger lands a sneak attack, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g}, which also multiplies on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}.
9765ad42-6390-4fd9-ba7b-4fd3d6d8fc6c: Whenever this +1 heavy crossbow makes its first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} during a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, it shoots two bolts at once. If both attacks hit, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 25) or take additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} and become {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for 1 round.
9e92decd-5f4a-4742-b87e-fe4eb81c3395: Whenever this +5 speed scythe hits a non-incorporeal enemy, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} additional precision {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
